Package index

Functions

list_data()
List Datasets in a Package
search_data()
Search and Filter Datasets Available in appliedepidata
get_data()
Retrieve and Load Datasets
save_data()
Save Data Files to a Specified Directory
create_desc()
Create Description of Variables for Roxygen Documentation

Data

AJS in Am Timan, Chad (2016) - English

AJS_AmTiman
Linelist data from an outbreak of Acute Jaundice Syndrome (AJS) in Chad 2016
AJS_AmTiman_population
Population data from an outbreak of Acute Jaundice Syndrome (AJS) in Chad 2016
Blocksshape
Shapefile of housing blocks from an outbreak of Acute Jaundice Syndrome (AJS) in Chad 2016
Quartiersshape
Shapefile of neighbourhoods (fr: quartiers) from an outbreak of Acute Jaundice Syndrome (AJS) in Chad 2016

Multidisease lab and surveillance data, Feveria (2024) - English

multidisease_tests
Test results for notifiable disease surveillance cases in Feveria in 2024
multidisease_notifications
Notifiable disease surveillance data from Feveria in 2024

Sitrep example datasets - English

mortality_survey_data
Fake data for a mortality survey
mortality_survey_dict
Fake data dictionary for a mortality survey

COVID-19 data in Fulton County, USA (2020) - English

fulton_data
Anonymized COVID-19 linelist data from Fulton County (USA), 2020
fulton_data_clean
Clean anonymized COVID-19 linelist data from Fulton County (USA), 2020
fulton_population
Zip-code population data Fulton County (USA), 2020

Fictional Mpox data from 5 European countries (2022) - English

mpox_linelist
Fictional mpox linelist data from five European countries, 2022
mpox_aggregate_table
Fictional cumulative mpox case totals from five European countries, 2022

Fictional linelist data from Salmonella outbreak in Stegen, Germany (1998) - English

stegentira_data
Linelist for fictionalized salmonella outbreak in Stegen, Germany

Influenza A H7N9 data in China (2013) - English

fluH7N9_China_2013
Linelist data from an outbreak of influenza A H7N9 in China 2013.

Fictional linelist data from Ebola outbreak in Sierra Leone (2014) - English

linelist_raw
Fictional Ebola Virus Disease data simulating properties from the West African Ebola outbreak of 2014
linelist_cleaned_excel
Cleaned fictional Ebola Virus Disease data simulating properties from the West African Ebola outbreak of 2014
linelist_cleaned_rds
Cleaned fictional Ebola Virus Disease data simulating properties from the West African Ebola outbreak of 2014
hospital_linelists
Subset of cleaned fictional Ebola Virus Disease data simulating properties from the West African Ebola outbreak of 2014
linelist_cleaned_with_adm3
Subset with additional spatial data of cleaned fictional Ebola Virus Disease data simulating properties from the West African Ebola outbreak of 2014
cleaning_dict
Example data dictionary for fictional Ebola Virus Disease data simulating properties from the West African Ebola outbreak of 2014
sle_adm3
Shapefile at admin 3 level for Sierra Leone from Humanitarian Data Exchange
sle_admpop_adm3_2020
Population data at admin level 3 for Sierra Leone from Humanitarian Data Exchange
epinow_res epinow_res_small generation_time incubation_period
Outputs from epinow2 based on fictional Ebola Virus Disease data simulating properties from the West African Ebola outbreak of 2014

Fictional case data for a generic disease to demonstrate contact tracing (2020) - English

cases_clean contacts_clean followups_clean relationships_clean
Fictional case data for a generic disease to demonstrate contact tracing

Fictional counts of malaria cases from Mozambique (2019) - English

district_weekly_count_data
Fictional counts of malaria cases from Mozambique in 2019
malaria_facility_count_data
Fictional counts of malaria cases from Mozambique in 2019

Next generation sequencing data of Shigella surveillance samples from Belgium (2013-2019) - English

Shigella_tree
Next generation sequencing data of Shigella surveillance samples from Belgium 2013-2019
sample_data_Shigella_tree
Linelist data to accompany next generation sequencing data of Shigella surveillance samples from Belgium 2013-2019
Shigella_subtree_2
Phylogenetic tree produced from next generation sequencing data of Shigella surveillance samples from Belgium 2013-2019

Fictional country demographic and mortality data to demonstrate standardisation (2020) - English

country_demographics country_demographics_2 deaths_countryA deaths_countryB
Fictional country demographic and mortality data to demonstrate standardisation
world_standard_population_by_sex
World “standard population” by sex

Other fictional example data

likert_data
Fictional likert data for demonstration purposes

Fictional data for a mortality survey - English

survey_data
Fake data for a mortality survey
survey_dict
Fake data dictionary for a mortality survey
population
Fake population data for a mortality survey

Campylobacter surveillance data from Germany (2001-2011) - English

campylobacter_germany
Linelist data of Campylobacter surveillance in Germany 2001-2011.
germany_weather
Weather data for Germany from 2001-2011
